name: Anaphero
long_description:
We're on a mission to make healthcare more accessible and human with AI voice technology. Our platform enables health systems to automate clinical conversations, from phone triage to care advice to follow-ups.

We've developed proprietary natural language models tailored for healthcare, built on top of advanced speech AI and knowledge representation. Our goal is to relieve overburdened clinicians, improve care access, and help health systems thrive in a challenging economic climate.

Our founding team brings together decades of experience across conversational AI, healthcare IT, and enterprise SaaS. We're backed by top healthcare VCs and have partnerships with several leading health systems.
